siteMetadata.title: Micro Binfie Virtual Conference 2020
siteMetadata.subtitle: An online seminar series chaired by the Micro Binfie Podcast

markdownRemark.html:
Schedule

Time: 16:00 6 May 2020 (UTC)

Zoom link: Coming soon.

Discord link: https://discord.gg/WmuRbD

  • 15:00 From phylogenetics to phylogenomics: between bacterial strains and the tree of life Leonardo de Oliveira Martins (Quadram Institute Bioscience)
  • 15:30 DEN-IM: dengue virus genotyping from amplicon and shotgun metagenomic sequencing
    Inês Mendes (Instituto de Medicina Molecular)
  • 15:50 Same same but different: Functional diversity despite identical 16S rRNA sequences
    Rebecca Ansorge (Quadram Institute Bioscience)
  • 16:20 Virtual coffee break Inês Mendes DEN-IM: dengue virus genotyping from amplicon and shotgun metagenomic sequencing Instituto de Medicina Molecular Rebecca Ansorge Quadram Institute Bioscience

frontmatter.title: Session 4, 6th May 2020
